scripts.buildx:init: docker buildx create --use --name amd64builder 2>/dev/null || docker buildx use amd64builder && docker buildx inspect --bootstrap
scripts.build: npm run build:app && npm run build:api
scripts.build:app: npm run buildx:init && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64 -t registry.digitalocean.com/sequenced-registry/sequenced-frontend:latest -f packages/app/Dockerfile --push .
scripts.build:api: npm run buildx:init && docker buildx build --platform linux/amd64 -t registry.digitalocean.com/sequenced-registry/sequenced-api:latest -f packages/api/Dockerfile --push .
